statements: UPDATE property_listings SET price = 150000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE property_listings SET bedrooms = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE property_listings SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price + 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price * 1.1, bedrooms = bedrooms + 1 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE property_listings SET address = CONCAT(address, ', New York') WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = 200000 WHERE property_id = 101;
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = 500000 WHERE client_id = 201;
UPDATE property_listings SET location = 'New York' WHERE property_id = 102;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price + 100 WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE price < 500000;
UPDATE client_preferences SET min_price = min_price * 0.9, max_price = max_price * 0.9 WHERE client_id = 1;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = 15000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = 200000.00 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE interest_requests SET status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE location LIKE 'New York' AND price < 500000
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = max_price - 10000 WHERE min_price > 100000 AND property_type = 'Apartment'
UPDATE interest_requests SET status = 'Approved', request_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE client_id = 101 AND property_id = 201
UPDATE property_listings SET price = 200000 WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE client_preferences SET min_price = 150000, max_price = 300000 WHERE client_id = 2;
UPDATE property_images SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image.jpg' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE property_listings SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM client_history WHERE status = 'favorited')
UPDATE property_listings SET address = CONCAT(address, ', New York') WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM client_history WHERE status = 'viewed')
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = max_price * 1.1, max_bedrooms = max_bedrooms + 1 WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_history WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01')
UPDATE property_listings SET property_price = 200000 WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = 500000 WHERE client_id = 3;
UPDATE appointments SET appointment_date = '2023-07-15' WHERE appointment_id = 2;
UPDATE property_listings SET property_price = property_price * 1.1 WHERE property_location = 'New York'
UPDATE client_preferences SET max_price = max_price - 1000 WHERE preferred_location = 'Los Angeles'
UPDATE appointments SET appointment_time = '10:00:00' WHERE appointment_id = 123
